# Assingment 3

::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_35f15c65761b22e6255ed52dd80c6549'}

```{.r .cell-code}
P_A<-0.04
P_nA<-1-P_A
P_BA<-0.97
P_BnA<-0.01

P_B<-P_BA*P_A+P_BnA*P_nA
P_AB<-(P_BA*P_A)/P_B
P_nAB<-(P_BnA*P_nA)/P_B

print(P_AB)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.8016529
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
print(P_nAB)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.1983471
```
:::
:::

These results show that in case the alarm is triggered, there is a possibility of about 20% that the product is flawless and a probability of 80% that the product is faulty.
